DataElement.preferredName: Prior Personal Medical History Immunologic Disease Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe a patient's other prior medical history as related to immunological diseases not already specified or mentioned.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Personal Medical History Immunologic Disease or Disorder Description
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced._The study of the body's immune system._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Description; a statement that represents something in words.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredDefinition: The study of the body's immune system.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:Description; a statement that represents something in words.

Concepts.definition: The study of the immune system and its reaction to pathogens, as well as its malfunctions (autoimmune diseases, allergies, rejection of organ transplants).

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released per approval by B. McClure-Shimel. mc 5/12/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/22/17 tt transferred context, added registration status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task. Modified for The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) by request of T. Lichtenberg (JP) 12/2010.
